sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"引用，复述"之意。
means: cite ： 指引经据典以示证明或凭据。
quote ： 指不加剪裁的直接引用原文或原话。
repeat ： 仅强调口头或笔头重复别人的话或字句，并不必指明出处。

sentence.Network_en: What was that marvellous quote that she came out with?
sentence.Network_cn: 她引用的那句妙语是什么来着？

sentence.Network_en: Always get a written quote for any repairs needed.
sentence.Network_cn: 每次进行修理都索要一份书面的报价单。

sentence.Network_en: We've only had an "average", quote, unquote, kind of recession.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们只有过一次被称作“一般性的”经济衰退。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used parenthetically when speaking to indicate the beginning and end (or just the beginning) of a statement or passage that one is repeating, especially to emphasize the speaker's detachment from or disagreement with the original
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)引文起——引文止（尤用以强调说话者对所引述文字的不同看法）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin quotare, from quot 'how many', or from medieval Latin quota (see quota). The original sense was 'mark a book with numbers, or with marginal references', later 'give a reference by page or chapter', hence 'cite a text or person' (late 16th cent.)

entry.def: If you quote someone as saying something, you repeat what they have written or said.

example.ex: He quoted Mr Polay as saying that peace negotiations were already underway...
example.tran: 他引用波利先生的话，说和谈已在进行之中。

example.ex: She was quoted in the Express by an unnamed source as saying: 'I won't bail out those two silly girls.'...
example.tran: 一位匿名的作者在《快报》中引用了她的话说：“我不会保释那两个傻丫头的”。

entry.def: A quote from a book, poem, play, or speech is a passage or phrase from it.

example.ex: The article starts with a quote from an unnamed member of the Cabinet.
example.tran: 文章的开头引用了一位未透露姓名的内阁成员说过的话。

entry.tran: 援引，引用(法律条款、事实等)
entry.def: If you quote something such as a law or a fact, you state it because it supports what you are saying.

example.ex: Mr Meacher quoted statistics saying that the standard of living of the poorest people had fallen.
example.tran: 米彻先生援引统计数据来说明最贫困人口的生活水平下降了。

entry.def: If someone quotes a price for doing something, they say how much money they would charge you for a service they are offering or for a job that you want them to do.

example.ex: A travel agent quoted her £160 for a flight from Bristol to Palma...
example.tran: 一位旅行社职员给她开出的从布里斯托尔至帕尔马的机票报价是160英镑。

example.ex: He quoted a price for the repairs.
example.tran: 他给出了维修费用的报价。

entry.def: A quote for a piece of work is the price that someone says they will charge you to do the work.

example.ex: Always get a written quote for any repairs needed.
example.tran: 每次进行修理都索要一份书面的报价单。

entry.def: If a company's shares, a substance, or a currency is quoted at a particular price, that is its current market price.

example.ex: In early trading in Hong Kong yesterday, gold was quoted at $368.20 an ounce...
example.tran: 在香港昨天早些时候的交易中，黄金的牌价为每盎司368.20美元。

example.ex: Heron is a private company and is not quoted on the Stock Market.
example.tran: 赫伦公司是一家私营公司，没有在股票交易市场挂牌。

entry.def: Quotes are the same as quotation marks .

example.tran: remembered 一词用引号括了起来。

entry.def: You can say 'quote' to show that you are about to quote someone's words.

example.ex: He predicts they will have, quote, 'an awful lot of explaining to do'.
example.tran: 他预计他们需要“大费周章地解释一番”，这是他的原话。

means.word_mean: 1. a punctuation mark used to attribute the enclosed text to someone else
2. a passage or expression that is quoted or cited
3. refer to for illustration or proof;

sentences.sentence: "He said he could quote several instances of this behavior"
"Here the author is quoting his colleague"

auth_sentence.content: I trust that someone will post the exact quote.
auth_sentence.res_content: I trust that someone will post the exact quote.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I trust that someone will post the exact quote.

auth_sentence.content: There's all kinds of wrong in that quote.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's all kinds of wrong in that quote.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's all kinds of wrong in that quote.

auth_sentence.content: Curie in foreign countries is too long to quote.
auth_sentence.res_content: Curie in foreign countries is too long to quote.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Curie in foreign countries is too long to quote.

Sentence.sentence: For example, one who doesn't know the rules a about plagiarism (剽窃) may accidentally use words or ideas without giving proper credit or one who fails to keep careful research notes may unintentionally fail to quote and cite sources as required.
They quote the best price in the market.
By quoting Stephen Trachtenberg the author wants to say that .

sentences.cn: 作者不断地引用莎士比亚的话。

sentences.en: Don't quote me on this, but I think the company is in serious difficulties.
sentences.cn: 不要向公司重复我所说的, 可我认为公司面临着严重的困难。

sentences.en: She quoted from the report to support her point.
sentences.cn: 她援引报告中的话来支持自己的论点。

sentences.en: Can you quote me an example of what you mean?
sentences.cn: 你能否给我举个例子来说明你的意思?

sentences.en: He is quoted as saying he disagrees with the decision.
sentences.cn: 用他的话说, 他不同意这一决定。

sentences.en: The company's shares are currently being quoted at 62 pence a share.
sentences.cn: 该公司股票的现在报价是每股62便士。

sentences.en: They quoted 756 dollars for the single New York—London fare.
sentences.cn: 他们对纽约到伦敦的单程机票开价是756美元。

sentences.en: This is the best price I can quote you.
sentences.cn: 这是我给你开出的最有利的价钱了。

jushi.english: He quoted several cases of unjust imprisonment.
jushi.chinese: 他列举了几宗不公正的监禁案件。

jushi.english: He quoted some old Chinese sayings to illustrate his points.
jushi.chinese: 他引用了中国的一些俗话来解释他的观点。

jushi.english: He is quoted as having said that there will be an election this autumn.
jushi.chinese: 有人引用他的话说,今年秋季将举行一次选举。
